title: Oat and Date Muffins
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '80g porridge oats', '250ml milk', '5 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 egg whites', '75g butter, melted', '4 tablespoons apple sauce', '75g chopped pitted dates']
